p: Viruses cause cell destruction mainly in two ways; direct cytopathic effects of the virus and immune response mediated destruction [ 9]. COVID-19 cannot lyse the cells directly as the major pathway of cell destruction is due to immune-mediated destruction [ 10, 11]. It has been mentioned that unlike adults, less vigorous cell-mediated immune response in alveoli of children results in being asymptomatic in the majority of cases [ 3].
